mapper.select: select count(1) from cmdb_cientity_globalattritem where attr_id = #{value} limit 1
select count(1) from cmdb_cientity_globalattritem where item_id = #{value} limit 1

select cga.id, cga.name, cga.label, cga.is_active AS isActive, cga.is_multiple AS isMultiple, cga.description As description, cga.is_private AS isPrivate, cgai.id as itemId, cgai.value as itemValue, cgai.attr_id as itemAttrId, cgai.sort as itemSort from cmdb_global_attr cga left join cmdb_global_attritem cgai on cga.id = cgai.attr_id where cga.id = #{value} order by cgai.sort

select cga.id, cga.name, cga.label, cga.is_active AS isActive, cga.is_multiple AS isMultiple, cga.description As description, cgai.id as itemId, cgai.value as itemValue, cgai.attr_id as itemAttrId, cgai.sort as itemSort, cview.alias AS alias, IFNULL(cview.sort, 999999) AS `sort`, IFNULL(cview.`allow_edit`, 1) AS allowEdit from cmdb_global_attr cga left join cmdb_global_attritem cgai on cga.id = cgai.attr_id LEFT JOIN cmdb_view cview ON cga.id = cview.item_id AND cview.type = 'global' AND cview.ci_id = #{value} where cga.is_active = 1 order by sort, itemSort

select ccg.cientity_id as ciEntityId, ccg.item_id as itemId, ccg.attr_id as attrId, cga.name as attrName, cga.label as attrLabel, cgai.value as itemValue, cgai.attr_id as itemAttrId from cmdb_cientity_globalattritem ccg join cmdb_global_attr cga on ccg.attr_id = cga.id and cga.is_active = 1 join cmdb_global_attritem cgai ON ccg.item_id = cgai.id where ccg.cientity_id in #{value}

select ccg.cientity_id as ciEntityId, ccg.item_id as itemId, ccg.attr_id as attrId, cga.name as attrName, cga.label as attrLabel, cgai.value as itemValue, cgai.attr_id as itemAttrId from cmdb_cientity_globalattritem ccg join cmdb_global_attr cga on ccg.attr_id = cga.id and cga.is_active = 1 join cmdb_global_attritem cgai ON ccg.item_id = cgai.id where ccg.cientity_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into cmdb_global_attritem (id, value, attr_id, sort) values (#{id}, #{value}, #{attrId}, #{sort})
insert into cmdb_global_attr (id, name, label, is_active, is_multiple, description, is_private) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{label}, #{isActive}, #{isMultiple}, #{description}, 0)
insert ignore into cmdb_cientity_globalattritem (cientity_id, attr_id, item_id) values (#{ciEntityId}, #{attrId}, #{item.id})
mapper.delete: delete a, b from cmdb_global_attr a left join cmdb_global_attritem b on a.id = b.attr_id where a.id = #{value}
